title: Rajesh Kumar vs State of Tamil Nadu
snippet: Landmark judgment clarifying property rights under the Transfer of Property Act, with emphasis on title priority.

title: Meena Devi vs Bihar State Electricity Board
snippet: Important ruling on negligence and the duty of care by public utility authorities.

title: Anita Sharma vs Rakesh Sharma
snippet: Judgment dealing with maintenance rights of a wife under Section 125 CrPC and equitable relief in matrimonial disputes.
